message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.  Let me know your thoughts!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,350,000 for your product. I hope this aligns better with my budget.

Bob,  I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $1,350,000 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $1,375,000. This still leaves some room for both of us to be happy with the deal. What do you think?
I understand your position, Alice. After careful consideration, I am willing to increase my offer to $1,360,000 for your product. I believe this brings us closer to a mutually beneficial agreement.
